text: John Aniston (born Yannis Anastasakis; July 24, 1933 â€“ November 11, 2022) was a Greek-American television and movie actor. He was the father of actress Jennifer Aniston. He is best known for his role as Victor Kiriakis in Days of our Lives. That started in 1985. Aniston's career lasted 60 years. He appeared in over 100 television programs and movies. ==Early life== Aniston was born in Chania, Crete, Greece to Stella Jones and to Antonios Anastasakis. Aniston went to Pennsylvania State University. ==Marriage and family== Aniston was married to Nancy Dow from 1965 until they divorced in 1980. Aniston has been married to Sherry Rooney since 1984. With Dow, Aniston had 1 daughter, Jennifer Aniston. With Rooney he had a son, Alexander Rooney. ==Selected filmography== Starred in: * Love of Life (TV) (1975) * Search for Tomorrow (TV) (1978 1974) * Days of Our Lives (1985 2022) Guest starred in: * Gilmore Girls * Airwolf * Combat * My Big Fat Greek Life * Star Trek: Voyager * Mission: Impossible * Mad Men ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Greek actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
